description:
Raging Blasters is a highspeed scroller shooting game, packed with the exhilarating thrill of destruction.

You have been selected to undertake a top secret mission. Your mission is to destroy the enemy targets. Good luck! 

■ Arcade Mode
 - 8 challenging stages
 - Survive through all stages, each with different dangers ahead. Fight back with 2 types of shooting style and 5 types of sub-weapons!

■ Difficulty modes
- 3 difficulties to choose from: Normal, Hard and Expert

■ Against-the-clock
 - see how many points you can get within the 3 minute-limit. 

■ Play modes
- Solo
- Local Co-op
- Duo (playing as 2 players on one controller)

■ Scores
 - Yours scores will be recorded in both local and online leaderboards. Compete against other players around the world!!
name: Raging Blasters
